subject: RETEST v1.13.6: Events still 346 vs 384 (-38)
body:
Team,

Retested after v1.13.6 deployment (waited 30 sec):

## ALL 5 ENDPOINTS STATUS
| Endpoint | Express | AF TEST | Delta | Status |
|----------|---------|---------|-------|--------|
| Categories | 10 | 10 | 0 | PASS |
| Roles | 5 | 5 | 0 | PASS |
| Organizers | 49 | 47 | -2 | FAIL |
| Venues | 64 | 66 | +2 | FAIL |
| Events | 384 | 346 | -38 | FAIL |

Events unchanged at 346. The explicit $and syntax did not fix it.

Possible issue: Maybe the recurring events OR is not working correctly? We need 38 more events.

Or maybe v1.13.6 hasnt propagated to TEST yet?

- Sarah
